title: Crime Alert 11.30.20
itunes:title: Crime Alert 11.30.20
description:
Woman arrested on public intoxication sneaks out, and steals a postal truck. A man turned away from a recycling plant after trying to turn in a stolen utility pole.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
